body:
Hello @datapythonista! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`doc/make.py`](https://github.com/datapythonista/pandas/blob/b89fcc50f05496589048b817cffc8be2a09cf391/doc/make.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`doc/source/conf.py`](https://github.com/datapythonista/pandas/blob/b89fcc50f05496589048b817cffc8be2a09cf391/doc/source/conf.py) !

# [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/24287?src=pr&el=h1) Report

> The diff coverage is `n/a`.

can you do a followup to remove sphinxcontrib-spelling from any of the ci & environment.yml & also remove the spelling section from the contributing guide. thanks.

Thanks for pointing out @jreback, I totally forgot about it (and I double checked, and there were also some code left in `doc/make.py` I wasn't aware of).

I opened this follow up: #24299
